casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Chang YANG. No. 705P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2005. Kelly D. Miller, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Yang. Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2005."
